description: Hospital account based detail bill history for the guarantor.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HB_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for this hospital detail bill in detail bill history.

columns.name: EB_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for this enterprise detail bill record in detail bill history.

columns.name: BILL_RUN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The run type for this detail bill.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Statement


Hospital Account Detail Bill


Guarantor Detail Bill


Claim Detail Bill

columns.name: IS_DEMAND_DB_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate whether this detail bill was produced on demand or as part of the batch.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ACCEPT_DT
columns.description: The date the detail bill record was created.

columns.name: END_BATCH_DT
columns.description: The batch date of the detail bill.

columns.name: DB_DVRY_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores how the detail bill was delivered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paper, No Electronic Notification


Paperless, No Electronic Notification


Paper and Electronic Notification


Paperless, Electronic Notification

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who created the detail bill.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all charges on the detail bill.

columns.name: TOTAL_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all payments on the detail bill.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all adjustments on the detail bill.

columns.name: CUR_INS_BAL_AMT
columns.description: The total amount of the detail bill that is currently with insurance.

columns.name: CUR_PAT_BAL_AMT
columns.description: The total amount of the detail bill that is currently in self-pay.

columns.name: TOTAL_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The total amount due for this detail bill.

columns.name: DB_IS_MYC_NOTIF_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the detail bill notification was sent via MyChart.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DEMAND_DB_YN

columns.name: DB_PAPER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why the detail bill was sent via paper.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paperless Billing is disabled for the service area


User specified


Forced to paper because of self-pay follow-up level


Forced to paper because of guarantor rule


Forced to paper because of hospital account rule


Guarantor declined paperless billing


Financial Assistance Program Not Allowed In MyChart


Not self-pay correspondence


Form is not allowed to be displayed in MyChart


Guarantor missing associated patient or MyChart account


Guarantor is not MyChart active


Guarantor is not available in MyChart


No access to billing features in MyChart


MyChart tickler could not be sent


Professional billing letter not marked as Sent


Patient is not active on MyChart


Queued for printing based on estimate rule


Patient is deceased

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: Invoice number for a detail bill.
